doc.title: Central Park Walk
doc.plot: A man stands alone at night in the dark depths of New York's Central Park. He is accosted by an armed mugger who threatens to shoot him unless he hands over his wallet. The man claims to carry a large amount of cash but refuses to give it up. He explains that he had planned suicide but felt that it would be easier if someone else actually pulled the trigger. The mugger is incensed; he had never intended offering a public service and now feels that he is being taken advantage of. A darkly comic argument follows...
